description:
Chopper and Nami risk their own lives in a desperate attempt to save Luffy and Zoro from a monstrous wall of water! Meanwhile, Sanji moves ever closer to a reunion with Robin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nami Tamashii no Sakebi! Mugiwara no Luffy Fukkatsu!
Nami crie de toute son âme ! Le retour de Luffy au chapeau de paille !
Nami`s Soul Cries Out! Straw Hat Luffy Makes a Comeback!
Крик, идущий из сердца Нами! Возвращение Мугивары Луффи!
صرخة نامي من الرّوح! عودة قبّعة القشّ لوفي!
ナミ魂の叫び! 麦わらのルフィ復活!
